Egg Nursery

Welcome to the egg nursery... I've just compiled an idea... You! That is right, YOU!!! Can now breed you adopted pets... After you adopt a pet, e-mail me and I will tell you if it is male or female. Then, if you have two, male and female pokemon that you think love each other, e-mail me and they will appear on this page with an egg that will hatch in one week or less... This program is up now! When you want, e-mail me...
